Installation guide

The installation of codeare will require some prerequisites.

Mandatory:

  • omniORB > 4.1.2
  • Lapack (ATLAS, mkl, veclib, ACML and the like)
  • HDF5 > 1.6
  • FFTW (including float precision libraries) &rt; 3.2
  • NFFT 3.1.3
  • GSL > 1.11

Optional, however strongly recommended:

  • nifticlib 2.0.0
  • ITK 3.2.0

Optional, for file IO only, if desired:

  • MATLAB > 7.4

Ubuntu / Debian

You'll need to install

  • build-essential
  • libatlas-dev
  • libatlas-base-dev
  • liblapack-dev
  • itk3-dev
  • libinsighttoolkit3-dev
  • omniidl
  • libomniorb4-dev
  • libnifti-dev
  • libhdf5-serial-dev
  • fftw3-dev
  • libgsl0-dev

Building codeare

Fairly easy (f.e. ubuntu with MATLAB 2012a at the default location) 

> CXXFLAGS="-O3" CFLAGS="-O3" ./configure \
  --with-matlabroot=/opt/MATLAB/R2012a \ 
  --with-fftw=/usr --with-itkroot=/usr
> make
> make check
> make install
